p: Only the original UN/ECE texts have legal effect under international public law. The status and date of entry into force of this Regulation should be checked in the latest version of the UN/ECE status document TRANS/WP.29/343, available at: https://unece.org/status-1958-agreement-and-annexed-regulations
UN Regulation No 26 - Uniform provisions concerning the approval of vehicles with regard to their external projections [2022/82]
